coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH4Introduction-Hint: With Bibliosoph, you  can send messages, roll special tables, and generate encounters, all through the simple push of a macro button. Forget the hassle of complex operations, Bibliosoph delivers all results and communication in engaging, thematic cards. This module not only simplifies in-game processes, but also enhances your overall storytelling, bringing your world to life in a visually appealing way. Make your gaming experience more immersive and streamlined with the robust functionalities of the Bibliosoph module.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.showDiceRolls-Hint: Show virtual dice rolls when cards are generated.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubPartyMessageEnabled-Labe: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubPrivateMessageEnabled-La: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardLayoutPrivateMessage-Hint: Shows only recipient portraits in the chat card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.privateMessageCompressedWindow-Hint: Shows only recipient portraits in the chat window.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubBeverageEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubBioEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubInsultsEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubPraiseEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubInvestigationEnabled-Lab: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsOdds-Hint: Chance (0–100) to find coins when investigating. Roll 1d100 ≤ this value to find coins.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsMaxPlatinum-Hint: Maximum platinum pieces that can be found (0–max rolled).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsMaxGold-Hint: Maximum gold pieces that can be found (0–max rolled).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsMaxSilver-Hint: Maximum silver pieces that can be found (0–max rolled).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsMaxElectrum-Hint: Maximum electrum pieces that can be found (0–max rolled).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsMaxCopper-Hint: Maximum copper pieces that can be found (0–max rolled).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationOddsCommon-Hint: Relative weight (0–1000) for Common when rolling rarity. Weights are normalized; use low values (e.g. 1) for very rare tiers.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationOddsUncommon-Hint: Relative weight for Uncommon when rolling rarity.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationOddsRare-Hint: Relative weight for Rare when rolling rarity.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationOddsVeryRare-Hint: Relative weight for Very Rare when rolling rarity.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationOddsLegendary-Hint: Relative weight for Legendary when rolling rarity.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationInventorySummaryNoActor: No character or token selected; items were not added to inventory.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsSummaryNoActor: No character or token selected; coins were not added.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubGiftEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubShadygoodsEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubCriticalEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubFumbleEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubInspirationEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH2Injuries-Hint: Injuries alter the course of actions as each impact can unexpectedly ignite a new wound, trauma, or recovery chance, making your gaming journey uniquely fraught with peril and unpredictability.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubInjuriesEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH2Encounters-Hint: Set the odds of encountering a monster, configure your thresholds, and the Quick Encounter tool does the rest.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.quickEncounterEnabled-Hint: Show the Quick Encounter tool (CR-aware encounter builder) in the toolbar.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.quickEncounterCacheStatusTitle-Hint: Recommend and Roll use cached data for speed.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.quickEncounterCacheNone-Label: No cache — click Refresh to build
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.quickEncounterCacheNoneTitle-Hint: Build a cache to make Recommend and Roll much faster.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubQuickEncounterEnabled-La: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubQuickEncounterEnabled-Hi: Quick Encounter button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryQuickEncounterEnabled-Hint: Quick Encounter button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
